channel.title: CVE Feed for Arista Networks -- Arista EOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Arista Networks -- Arista EOS

item.title: CVE-2023-24510|2024-08-02T10:56:04.426Z -- arista%20networks -- arista%20eos
item.description: On the affected platforms running EOS, a malformed DHCP packet might cause the DHCP relay agent to restart.

item.title: CVE-2023-24509|2024-08-02T10:56:04.282Z -- arista%20networks -- arista%20eos
item.description: On affected modular platforms running Arista EOS equipped with both redundant supervisor modules and having the redundancy protocol configured with RPR or SSO, an existing unprivileged user can login to the standby supervisor as a root user, leading to a privilege escalation. Valid user credentials are required in order to exploit this vulnerability.
